cards.title: The Reverse Engineer
powers: You may discard the top card of your deck. Play the top card of your trash.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may use a power.
One player may play a card.
Play the top card of a hero trash.

openingLines.default: Nothing personal, but I need your tech for my upgrades.
openingLines.GuardiansOfTomorrow.TheLastMonsterHunter: I'm not the monster here. You are.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: I'm sure I can scrounge up something to use against you.

cards.title: Backlash Generator
body: If this card was played from your trash, draw a card.
The first time each turn {TheReverseEngineer} is dealt damage by a non-hero target, he deals the source of that damage 2 lightning damage.
cards.flavorReference: The Last Monster Hunter, Monster Hunted #1

cards.title: Nanite Sludge Sprayer
cards.body: If this card was played from your trash, you may destroy an environment card.
powers: Select up to 2 targets and reduce the next damage dealt by each of them by 2.
cards.flavorText: Is that Legion goop? I still don't have it{br}all out of my hair from last time!

cards.title: Transdimensional Blade
cards.body: If this card was played from your trash, {TheReverseEngineer} deals up to 3 targets 1 irreducible melee damage each.

cards.title: Unstable Amplifier
cards.body: If this card was played from your trash, increase damage dealt to villain targets by 1 until the end of this turn.
powers: {TheReverseEngineer} deals each non-hero target 1 sonic damage. Whenever a target is destroyed this way, {TheReverseEngineer} deals the non-hero target with the highest HP 1 sonic damage.
cards.flavorText: I'll get you for that...{br}once my ears stop ringing.

cards.title: Alpha Strike
body: If this card was played from your trash, you may use a power.
At the end of your turn, {TheReverseEngineer} may use up to 10 powers, then {TheReverseEngineer} deals himself fire damage equal to the number of powers used this way.
cards.flavorText: I'm giving it everything I've got!

cards.title: Zandatsu
body: If this card was played from your trash, {TheReverseEngineer} deals up to 1 target with 2 or less HP 2 irreducible melee damage.
Whenever {TheReverseEngineer} destroys a target, {TheReverseEngineer} gains 2 HP.

flavorQuotes.text: Hey man, have you played Metal Gear?

cards.title: Augmented Chassis
body: If this card was played from your trash, {TheReverseEngineer} gains 3 HP.

Increase damage dealt by {TheReverseEngineer} by 1. Reduce damage dealt to {TheReverseEngineer} by 1. At the end of your turn, {TheReverseEngineer} must destroy this card or deal himself 2 fire damage.
cards.flavorText: Hey ugly! Why don't you pick on someone{br}your own tech level!?
cards.flavorReference: The Reverse Engineer, Guardians of Tomorrow Annual #11

cards.title: Coolant Pack
body: If this card was played from your trash, {TheReverseEngineer} deals up to 3 targets 2 cold damage each.
Reduce fire damage dealt to {TheReverseEngineer} by 4. At the start of your turn, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: You want to know what's in the tank? Chill.
cards.flavorReference: The Reverse Engineer, Guardians of Tomorrow Annual #11

cards.title: Surprise Payload
body: If this card was played from your trash, {TheReverseEngineer} deals 1 target 3 projectile damage.
You may destroy 1 of your equipment cards. If you do {TheReverseEngineer} deals each villain target 1 projectile and 1 fire damage, then you may draw 2 cards.

cards.title: Aggressive Salvaging
body: If this card was played from your trash, reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Draw one and discard the other.
{TheReverseEngineer} deals 1 target 2 melee damage. Play the top card of your trash.
cards.flavorText: Can I borrow that processor? Thanks!
cards.flavorReference: The Reverse Engineer, Guardians of Tomorrow #109

cards.title: Tweaked Calibration
body: If this card was played from your trash, increase the next damage dealt by {TheReverseEngineer} by 2.
Discard a card. Play the top card of your trash. You may use a power. If you do, {TheReverseEngineer} deals himself 2 fire damage.
cards.flavorText: If I dilate the aperture by 3.6mm, I can{br}improve the range by at least 3 feet. I{br}need some spare parts.
cards.flavorReference: The Reverse Engineer, Guardians of Tomorrow #109

cards.title: Energy Converter
body: If this card was played from your trash, you may destroy an ongoing card.

After {TheReverseEngineer} is dealt 3 or more damage from a single source, you may reveal the top card of your deck and either replace or discard it, then {TheReverseEngineer} deals each villain target 1 energy damage.
cards.flavorText: You keep hitting me, and I keep getting{br}stronger!
cards.flavorReference: The Reverse Engineer, Guardians of Tomorrow Annual #11

cards.title: Gear Recovery
body: If this card was played from your trash, {TheReverseEngineer} gains 2 HP
Search your trash for an equipment card and put it into play.
cards.flavorText: You know, boomerangs would save me{br}so much effort.
cards.flavorReference: The Reverse Engineer, Guardians of Tomorrow #102

cards.title: Reengineer
body: If this card is played from your trash, draw a card.
Play the top card of your trash. Draw a card.
cards.flavorText: Hold on, I need a minute to get something{br}ready! Don't die in the meantime!
cards.flavorReference: The Reverse Engineer, Guardians of Tomorrow Annual #11
